content: The whole IHE ITI Technical Framework (20 years of work) is now available in html form. This will be dual published with the existing PDF with the PDF being retired at the end of next year. The effort sets the stage or all domains to do similar. With all our technical publications to be published on https://profiles.ihe.net
note that Trial Implementation supplements were not converted, as they will convert as they go Final Text or have major revisions (see IUA, and soon MHD)

One comment, it would be good if the metadata sections of Vol. 3 could be added to the ToC links. A lot of what's needed is the metadata sections so adding a link to the DocumentEntry, SubmissionSet and Folder sections (and possibly error messages) would be good
yup, that is already recorded as a second phase issue.

One comment, it would be good if the metadata sections of Vol. 3 could be added to the ToC links. A lot of what's needed is the metadata sections so adding a link to the DocumentEntry, SubmissionSet and Folder sections (and possibly error messages) would be good

You can get to these links from the Vol. 3 page: https://profiles.ihe.net/ITI/TF/Volume3/
As John stated, expandable sections in the side bar are coming soon...
